Text:
thank you my friend npto for this i bought the dvd concert because they are one of my favorite bands of all time...excellent musicians, looking fwd to hearing the vinyl...ps thanks to the original uploader for making this piece available us vinyl worshippers really appreciate this stuff, wish i could have attended a concert of that tour but here in the U.S. tickets started at 300.00 a piece and up, which is a bit tough on the wallet so i had to just by the dvd which was done very well they still had it for sure...thanks again,    
vintage_vinyl
